name: sfdxOrgDeployment-build-test-deploy
friendlyName: SFDX Org Development Model - Build & Deploy
description: An Azure Devops extension to perform some tricks with SFDX. Once executed will download and install the latest version of Salesforce CLI, authenticate in a target destionation using an JWT Oauth grant and execute one or more deploys, including destructive changes and possibly anonymous apex execution.
author: Ricardo Santana

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type of destination org (production vs sandbox)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of deployment, could be one of the two: production or sandbox (default)

inputs.name: privateKeyPath
inputs.label: Private Key Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for the encrypted private key to be used on force:auth:jwt:grant

inputs.name: decryptionKey
inputs.label: Decryption Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Decryption key to be used to decrypt the private key

inputs.name: decryptionIV
inputs.label: Decryption IV
inputs.helpMarkDown: Decryption IV to be used to decrypt the private key

inputs.name: clientID
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client ID / Consumer Key of a connected app to the target destination

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to be used to connect in the target destination

inputs.name: checkonly
inputs.label: Checkonly Deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flag that will indicate whether the deploy is a checkonly deploy or not. If is a checkonly, on force:source:deploy command the option -c will be appended

inputs.name: manifestFiles
inputs.label: Manifest Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of manifest files (package.xmls) to be used on deployments

inputs.name: testManifestFiles
inputs.label: Test Manifest Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of test manifest files (package.xmls) to be used on deployments

inputs.name: deployWaitTime
inputs.label: Deploy Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of minutes for wait time for deployment to finish. Default is 10

inputs.name: preDestructivePath
inputs.label: Destructive Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for the pre destructive changes manifest file

inputs.name: postDestructivePath
inputs.label: Destructive Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for post destructive changes manifest file

inputs.name: anonymousApex
inputs.label: Anonymous Apex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Anonymous Apex to be executed after deployment / destructive changes

inputs.name: artifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: To be used on release pipelines - path where the repo can be found
